title: Arch Linux Broke Easy Anti Cheat... AGAIN!!
description:
Why are we talking about this again, didn't we deal with GLIBC and DT_HASH nearly 2 years ago, well Arch Linux felt like it was time to bring this Easy Anti Cheat regression back for, reasons I guess.
